quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Learning is a treasure that will follow its owner everywhere.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Knowledge is power. Information is liberating. Education is the premise of progress, in every society, in every family.
quotes.author: Kofi Annan

quotes.text: The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
quotes.author: Plutarch

quotes.text: Strive for progress, not perfection.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Success is stumbling from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill

quotes.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: The beautiful thing about learning is that no one can take it away from you.
quotes.author: B.B. King

quotes.text: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
quotes.author: Helen Hayes

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quotes.author: Muhammad Ali

quotes.text: Life is either a daring adventure or nothing at all.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: Life is really simple, but we insist on making it complicated.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: The purpose of our lives is to be happy.
quotes.author: Dalai Lama

quotes.text: Life is either a great adventure or nothing.
quotes.author: Helen Keller

quotes.text: Life is short, and it's up to you to make it sweet.
quotes.author: Sarah Louise Delany

quotes.text: Life is a journey that must be traveled no matter how bad the roads and accommodations.
quotes.author: Oliver Goldsmith

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Your work is going to fill a large part of your life, and the only way to be truly satisfied is to do what you believe is great work.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

quotes.text: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quotes.author: Chris Grosser

quotes.text: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
quotes.author: Vidal Sassoon

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself as to why you can't achieve it.
quotes.author: Jordan Belfort

quotes.text: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
quotes.author: C.S. Lewis

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Roy T. Bennett

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
quotes.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quotes.text: Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
quotes.author: Steve Jobs

quotes.text: Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
quotes.author: John Lennon

quotes.text: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot, but make it hot by striking.
quotes.author: William Butler Yeats

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Peter Drucker

quotes.text: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.author: Nelson Mandela

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston S. Churchill
